description: This file defines a React-like component for creating a new note in a personal notes manager web application using Qwik framework. It handles rendering the UI, managing a notes store, and navigating upon save.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main component for the 'create new note' page.

methods.name: useTask$
methods.description: Runs a side effect to load notes when the component mounts.

methods.name: handleSave$
methods.description: Handles saving of a new note and redirects to the note's page.
